tool_description: Calculates Identical-By-Descent (IBD) segments between two DNA profiles to identify shared genetic regions inherited from common ancestors.

profile1_id.description: Identifier for the first DNA profile

profile2_id.description: Identifier for the second DNA profile

minimum_snp_count.description: Minimum number of SNPs in a segment (100-5000)

allow_gaps.description: Allow small gaps within IBD segments

gap_tolerance_cm.description: Maximum gap size to tolerate in cM (0.1-5.0)

phase_aware.description: Use phased data for more accurate IBD detection

error_messages: Profile not found: One or both DNA profile identifiers are invalid.
Invalid segment parameters: minimum_segment_cm must be 1.0-50.0, minimum_snp_count must be 100-5000.
Invalid gap tolerance: gap_tolerance_cm must be between 0.1 and 5.0.
Insufficient overlap: Not enough shared SNPs between profiles for IBD analysis.
Phasing data unavailable: phase_aware is true but phased data is not available.
usage: Provide two profile IDs and adjust minimum_segment_cm and minimum_snp_count based on relationship distance. Closer relatives need lower thresholds.

largest_segment_cm.description: Length of largest IBD segment in cM
